articles.title: Signs of being prone to adult diabetes can be seen from very young age: Study - ANI News
articles.description: Washington D.C. [USA], June 20 (ANI): Early signs of being more susceptible to type 2 diabetes as an adult can be seen in children as young as eight years old, decades before it is likely to be diagnosed, according to a new study.
